definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
see 有情人終成眷屬|有情人终成眷属[you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3]
to treat each other as an honored guest (idiom)/mutual respect between husband and wife
fig. the man sings and the woman follows/fig. marital harmony
to be promoted and gain wealth (idiom)
lit. to lift the tray to eyebrow level (idiom); mutual respect in a marriage
for ever and ever
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
affectionate/intimate/warmhearted/to get intimate with sb
after one's heart (idiom); gratifying and satisfactory/everything one could wish
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)
inseparable (as form and shadow)
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
